task.title: Logging on to MobileView
task.shortdesc: To log on to MobileView, you must open the MobileView application and connect to the ClusterControl server.

prereq.p: Make sure that you have your username, password, and the name of the server that you want to connect to.

context.p: Once you are logged on, you can log off and disconnect from a particular project without closing MobileView. Logging off without closing the application is helpful if you plan to log on again using a different username and password.
context.note: You might automatically be logged off after a period of inactivity.

step.cmd: To open MobileView, click Start All programs Company Name MobileView.
step.info: You will see the End User Login Screen. End User Login Screen

step.cmd: In the dialog box, do one of the following:

choices.choice: Enter your MobileView username and password.
Log on using your Windows user account by selecting the Windows selection button.

step.cmd: In the directory field, enter the name or IP address of the main Product Name Cluster Control server.
If you are required to log on with supervision, your supervisor must provide a username and password.
To log off, click the Home tab and then click Log Off button.
